name: Kobitodzukan: Kobito no Fushigi - Jikken Set
name_original: Kobitodzukan: Kobito no Fushigi - Jikken Set
description:
Kobitodzukan: Kobito no Fushigi - Jikken Set is an arcade game developed by Nippon Columbia. It came out on 12-12-2013. It was published by Nippon Columbia.
You can play Kobitodzukan: Kobito no Fushigi - Jikken Set on Nintendo 3DS.
